extendedInfo.description: !! We have just added Catch-notes import for a smooth transition to your new favorite notes app !! Export to ZIP format and use our web site at https://mobislenotes.com after creating an account.â The dead-simple way to do notes and to-doâs â Have you tried Evernote, Remember the Milk, Wunderlist and other notes or to-do apps for your phone but think thereâs just too much going on getting in the way of the actual note-taking? Tags, due-dates, categories, projects, font-styling, notes on the notes, and what-not. Note-taking shouldnât be work, it should be a simple unloading of your brain to save for later. With MobisleNotes, weâre going back to basics. Itâs the actual digital equivalent of your trusty old notepad. Just write down whatever is on your mind. Done with it? Just check it off. Simple as that. Notes and checklists. Well, ok. Thereâs a liiitle bit more: â CHECKLIST/PLAIN TEXT SWITCHING Writing down ideas, or making a to-do list? Doesnât matter. Just write, and switch whenever you feel like it. â FOLDERS, REMINDERS AND PASSWORDS What you need to stay organized and keep your notes safe. â GLOBAL SEARCH Where did I put that cake recipe? Never fear, global search is here! â NOTE COLLABORATION Co-work on notes with your friends or better half. Make plans together, share a shopping list or write a novel together. â BACKED UP AND SYNCED ACROSS ALL YOUR DEVICES iPhone, iPad, Macs or PCs, edit your notes wherever you want and your notes stay synced and backed up. â SHARE NOTES PRIVATELY OR PUBLICLY Share notes with anyone using a simple URL, keeping them updated as you edit them. Keywords : Notebook, NotePad, Notes, Shopping List, ToDo List, 2do, Colornote, Evernote, Task, Memo, Sticky Note, Post It, notes, notepad, evernote, gtd, wunderlist, è®°äºæ¬, ë©ëª¨ì¥, catch, springpad, Mobisle notes, Ð±Ð»Ð¾ÐºÐ½Ð¾Ñ, any.do, anydo, A product by Mobisleapps AB (http://mobisleapps.com)

reviews.title: Analytics software is included!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t you guys wanted to mention about you have included a Flurry Agent in it? Sending personal data without a permission,ha?  It was a perfect note a long time ago.
reviews.author: Arthur Shogenoff

reviews.title: Used to Love it
reviews.comment: Sync no longer works.  $rb is way to much to enable it. Simple to use and the new sync is cool.  I use our groceries for shopping lists, and now for general shared to do lists too.  Bye mobisle notes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grr
reviews.comment: Something\'s wrong with my app! My stuffs cannot be edited, my screen pointer won\'t move past the first line.
reviews.author: Jannela Laurel

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: WOW this is awesome I finally found an app. That I can hide in my phone with installing and uninstalling that if someone looks at my phone they won\'t see my privacy and my notes.    Thank you for coming out with this app.     Whats awsome is that u can delete the app. Off your phone and redown load to sign back in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paid & No Account!
reviews.comment: I used to LOVE it! Now after upgrading, they\'ve not only discontinued the upgraded version, but now I don\'t have an account, though somehow it syncs? Paid for nothing apparently. Thnx.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Notepad App
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it is supposed to do! Great for either checklists or for making notes. I love that it uploads your notes so you never have to worry about losing important info if something happens to your phone. Only complaint - I wish it had some theme or customization options.
reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: First app to really get me organised after years of trying, including trying to write my own. Cloud sync works great too, switching to a new phone was a dream
reviews.author: Rhys Daniell

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Fabulous app. Easy to use, understand, and customize. Would like it if the Widgit was able to be size-customized though.
reviews.author: Charlene Flitsch

reviews.title: Worked better before
reviews.comment: The app on my DROID 3 worked well. However, I installed the app on my Galaxy S3 and the checked items no longer sort to the bottom although that option is checked.
reviews.author: Simone Ollison-Jones

reviews.title: A+ for concept. A- for execution
reviews.comment: Pro: Totally intuitive. Elegant, attractive interface. Indent handles like a dream since the last update. Scrolling checkable homescreen widget functions smoothly. Con: Feels very small on a 7\" tablet. No sharing without a premium membership, which at $10/year is too steep for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Mobile Notepad
reviews.comment: Easy to organize. Easy to get to on the computer. Easy to password protect the important stuff. So convenient!
reviews.author: Dyani Dussault

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does what it says and does it very well. One bug - Web addresses for makers don\'t work?  Hope they\'re still around,  they should be proud of this.
reviews.author: Peter Cook

reviews.title: Fee to collaborate!!!
reviews.comment: It was great before the fees. Used it as much as evernote. Glad evernote has checklist option for free across all my devices. Removing this app.
reviews.author: Michael Smith

reviews.title: I like the design <3
reviews.comment: The design refreshes my minds. This is a great app for note taking only. However, when including pictures or taking photos, it is not recommendable for such note intensive taking.
reviews.author: Valerie Delgado

reviews.title: Scheming Swedes!
reviews.comment: Loved the app when it came out. Hated it when went red. Works good again but why do I have to pay twice to be ad free? I bought the original but I guess since it\'s a new version they must expect more money. Garbage. You\'ll get the other 4 stars when this is solved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but not on Share menu
reviews.comment: Pro:  Clean interface, very intuitive.  Especially good for to do lists - you can create a scrollable clickable widget.  Premium subscription has collaboration and web sharing (I didn\'t try).  Con:  You can sort manually and organize into folders but no #hashtags.  Also it does not appear on the Android Share menu.
reviews.author: C Campbell

reviews.title: Clean, Elegant,  Effective
reviews.comment: The basics, done cleanly and clearly.  Tried several and not impressed by others - overbuilt and clunky.  Ad-free cost for Mobisle Notes Premium tho is a bit high.  Free app works fine all the same.  Good job!  (Galaxy S2)
reviews.author: Dean Whitehead

reviews.title: Count the stars!
reviews.comment: You guys are doing an excellent job! The app has a nice simple setup which is easily navigated. I\'m proud to be Swedish!
reviews.author: Jonatan Hansson

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: It\'s great, simple n to the point. A checklist or notepad, nothing complicated. No menus to go thru or bulky space. Only bad is fonts, I like diff fonts n sizes n bolding words
reviews.author: Tina Louise

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I need it for. I needed a simple note taking software that I could forward via email as plain text and save to my phone... hassle free, no cloud necessary...
reviews.author: Art Tremble
